mapper.select: SELECT a.ticketing_sq AS ticketingsq, a.ticket_sq AS ticketsq, TO_CHAR(b.ticketing_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ticketingdate, d.show_name AS showname, a.ticket_no AS ticketno, a.ticket_seat AS ticketseat, TO_CHAR(c.start_time, 'YYYY.MM.DD" "HH24"시 "MI"분') AS starttime, a.ticket_seat_price AS ticketseatprice, a.ticket_stat AS ticketstat, a.ticket_active AS ticketactive, c.show_sq AS showsq FROM ticket a FULL OUTER JOIN ticketing b ON a.ticketing_sq = b.ticketing_sq LEFT JOIN showing c ON a.showing_sq = c.showing_sq LEFT JOIN show d ON c.show_sq = d.show_sq WHERE ( a.ticketing_sq IN ( SELECT ticketing_sq FROM ticketing WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} ) OR c.showing_sq IN ( SELECT DISTINCT showing_sq FROM ticket WHERE ticketing_sq IN ( SELECT ticketing_sq FROM ticketing WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} ) ) ) AND a.ticket_stat = #{stat} ORDER BY a.ticket_sq desc

SELECT TO_CHAR(y.transfer_board_reg_date , 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS transferBoardRegDate, y.transfer_board_sq AS transferboardsq, z.ticket_sq AS ticketsq, z.show_name AS showname, z.ticket_seat AS ticketseat, z.ticket_seat_price AS ticketseatprice, y.hope_price AS hopeprice, z.ticket_stat AS ticketstat, z.ticket_active AS ticketactive FROM transfer_board y INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.ticket_sq, d.show_name, a.ticket_seat, a.ticket_seat_price, a.ticket_stat, a.ticket_active FROM ticket a FULL OUTER JOIN ticketing b ON a.ticketing_sq = b.ticketing_sq LEFT JOIN showing c ON a.showing_sq = c.showing_sq LEFT JOIN show d ON c.show_sq = d.show_sq WHERE ( a.ticketing_sq IN ( SELECT ticketing_sq FROM ticketing WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} ) OR c.showing_sq IN ( SELECT DISTINCT showing_sq FROM ticket WHERE ticketing_sq IN ( SELECT ticketing_sq FROM ticketing WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} ) ) ) AND a.ticket_stat = 4 ORDER BY a.ticket_sq DESC ) z ON y.ticket_sq = z.ticket_sq ORDER BY transferboardsq desc
